Review Text: The breakfast buffet had great food but the customer service was exceptional.  If you want to experience what World class customer service is, I would recommend the Crowne Plaza Hotel.  From the transfer from the airport to the check-in experience and the breakfast, I have been met with nothing but perfection.  I have only been in country for 2 hours and if for nothing else, I would return to experience the servitude mindset the rest of the world should strive to match.
Location: Crowne Plaza Dubai - Festival City, an IHG hotel

Review Title: Great Service and Amazing View in Festival City
Review Text:
1.	Hotel Location:
As part of our recent trip to Dubai in UAE, we stayed at the Crowne Plaza Dubai - Festival City for Seven nights. The hotel is located in the heart of the city in Dubai Festival City at a convenient location. It is located just 8 km from the Burj Khalifa, 7.5 km away from Dubai Mall, and just 2 km from Dubai International Airport. It is connected to one of the best Malls in Dubai (i.e., Festival City Mall) with a walk of 12 to 15 minutes. This connection made our day. The waterfront rooms have an amazing view of the sea and you would enjoy seeing the boats’ lights at night.

2.	Facilities of the hotel:
The 5-star Crowne Plaza Dubai - Festival City can accommodate both leisure and business tourists. The hotel offers rooms and suites on 19 floors, including standard rooms, waterfront view rooms, and suites spread across its 19 floors. Some of them have city views and others come with an amazing waterfront view. In addition to its luxurious rooms and suites, the hotel offers a wide range of amenities and activities to its visitors. There are two swimming pools (one small for kids) on the 5th floor and a fitness center. The pool opens from 7am to 8pm and there is a pool guard who provides towels and free waters. Guests can use the pools in the Intercontinental Dubai festival city as well. In addition, there was some renovation work in the main restaurant, however, we had breakfasts in the restaurant located at the ground floor. Moreover, there is a bank ATM machine available in the hotel if you want to withdraw some cash.

As soon as we entered the hotel reception, we were completely taken aback by the support from bell boys and Concierge. Guests and other visitors can park their cars in the free self-parking area or request Concierge to park their cars as well. Most importantly, the hotel is connected to Dubai’s Festival City Mall with a walk of 12 to 15 minutes. This connection made our day as we laterally do not move our car.

3.	Fabulous Rooms with Astonishing Waterfront View:
The Waterfront room is big and spotless. Room Design was and atmosphere was excellent. The rooms are always clean. Each room has either one large bed or two single beds which are all very comfortable. The room has a fantastic view of the waterfront and the boats at nights as well as Burj Khalifa. The room is 34m2 and can easily accommodate 3 adults or 2 adults with two children. We requested extra bed, however, the room still big enough. It features a bedroom with a bath, sofa, an air conditioning, Flat screen LCD TVs with various channels, an iron, an iron table, a working desk, a coffee machine, safety box, a fridge with free water, and complimentary toiletries. The room does not have balcony. However, the view from the room was breathtaking (Waterfront view).

The bathroom is big enough. It includes a bathtub within a rain shower half enclosure. The soap, shower gel, shampoo, and hair conditioner are all of a great quality. I honestly liked the smell of the shower gel. There are many towels offered, including hand, body, and facial towels. One sink and a big mirror are in the main bathroom. Toilet paper and facial tissue are both of good quality. Moreover, there is water shut off in the bathroom. The hotel also offers complimentary slippers as well as tooth brush and bastes in a daily basis. 

4.	Tasty and diversified Breakfast:
We tried the breakfast at the main restaurant which is located at ground floor. The breakfast was available from 6:30 am to 11:00 am every day. It was delicious and diverse. When you have your breakfast, you'll be enjoying the food and therefore won't have to worry about counting calories. As said, Healthy food feeds and warms the heart and spirit.

There are various sections in the restaurant for the buffet breakfast. A section for fresh orange juice, drinks and fruits is included in the restaurant's buffet. The breakfast buffet also includes sections for Asian cousin, breads & waffles, salad, cheese, hot sections and a live station with many cocks. I advise trying the Omelet which is prepared by Chef Mohammed Al Husari. You will not regret it. I also recommend the cheese pie as well as Zatar pie.

5.	Excellent staff:
The hotel’s staff have made your experience more memorable. Excellent and welcoming service was provided by the Crowne Plaza Dubai - Festival City. You feel the international standards of Crowne Plaza reflected in the attitude and services quality. The check-in and check-out processes went seamless. The staff provides great hospitality and service quality. We were warmly welcomed, and they were quite accommodating with good customer service. The staff is incredibly friendly, respectful, and accommodating. They will never hesitate to help in any form and they consistently keep you happy. It is undoubtedly true that " It is good people who make good places".
Many thanks to the following individuals for your support while I was there:
- Leadership: Mohammed Faid, Don, Aimee, Suzana Shaban, and Juliana Khalifa
- Reservation: Zehera Miftah
- Front desk/ bell boys: Arun (supervisor), Aushi, Islam and Man Kumar
- Housekeeping: Christopher, Rahan, and Zubair
- Concierge/Parking: Frender, Lakbir, Dinish, Ghulam, & Zahoor
- Operator: Badika, Jelani, Ajan, Imanweel, Sajan, & Abbo
- Restaurant: Victor, Karam, Jowana, Mumammed Habib (trainee)m Alth (cook), Ahmed (supervisor), Chef Mohammed Al Husari, Janipa, Vikram, Ulu, Fayz, Faizan, & Salah
- Room service: Nawras
- Technician / Maintenance: Deeleb and Sabi

In conclusion:
Overall, we had a fantastic time at the Crowne Plaza Dubai - Festival City and appreciated the warmth. The hotel and staff exceeded our expectations. The facilities were fantastic, and the location is excellent. The staff was very good and the rooms were spotless and quite comfy with great view of the sea. We have received a good service from every single departments with no exception.

The Crowne Plaza Dubai - Festival City is a fantastic spot for people to unwind and enjoy relaxing stay, great view and good service quality. Hence, I would certainly and strongly recommend staying there with no hesitation.
Location: Crowne Plaza Dubai - Festival City, an IHG hotel

Review Text:
Dear  Crowne Plaza Festival City Team,

We would like to extend our heartfelt thanks for the wonderful experience we had during our stay with you. From the warm welcome to the impeccable service, everything exceeded our expectations and made our time in Dubai truly special, as always.

A sincere thank you to the manager, Mr Hassan,  for the exceptional professionalism, kindness, and attention to detail, and to Mahmoud who took care of us at the Zaytoun restaurant.

We will not hesitate to recommend your hotel and look forward to coming back.

Warmest regards,
Erais family

Review Text: We stayed as a family for 6 nights at the Crowne Plaza Festival City. Rooms are super clean and the whole team makes you feel at home. Everyone is super friendly to you, big kudos to them! The breakfast and dinner high quality and very very tasty. On our last day over breakfast Mahmoud had another chat with us and gave us some tips for next time we would come. So you see, they really care about their guests. All in all had a super holiday.

Review Title: Wonderful family stay — we’ll definitely be back!
Review Text:
We absolutely loved our family vacation! The room was spacious, spotless, and incredibly comfortable. The staff were fantastic, especially at the restaurant — always smiling and attentive (special thanks to the breakfast team : Bhawna, Emylin,  Winifred, Joana, Kailash, Fareed….  And to the dinner team :  Shelly and his team for this greatest moment) 

Breakfast and dinner were excellent, with plenty of variety each dan. 

We especially loved the pools — perfect for all ages, even toddlers — and the on-site daycare, which was super convenient.

One of the best parts: the hotel is directly connected to a shopping mall, so everything you need is right at your fingertips.
Location: Crowne Plaza Dubai - Festival City, an IHG hotel

Review Text:
I am always delighted to stay at the Crowne Plaza Festival City Hotel in Dubai! 
The rooms are cozy, luxurious, and spacious, and the hospitality is consistently outstanding! My friends and I are always warmly welcomed and provided with exceptional service! 
I would like to extend my heartfelt thanks to Mr Abdul at the reception desk, who is always caring, attentive, and incredibly helpful!
I wholeheartedly recommend the Crowne Plaza Festival City as the ideal place to stay in Dubai!
Location: Crowne Plaza Dubai - Festival City, an IHG hotel

Review Title: Nice hotel but plenty of room for improvement
Review Text:
We stayed half board & had dinner at Anise restaurant every evening. We loved the food, such a great variety & labelled with allergens. The fact that water was complimentary during dinner was a pleasant surprise & very appreciated.

I have a gluten free diet & I found breakfast to be unaccommodating! I emailed the hotel before my arrival & then mentioned it again on our first morning at breakfast. They only had bread, no cereals, no biscuits, no cakes. The next morning still nothing available. I ended up going to the supermarket in the mall & purchasing some biscuits. It wasn’t until our 5th morning that I was given some cookies from a packet. In a 5 star hotel in Dubai this was not acceptable. I have stayed in 3 star hotels where they have prepared me crepes/pancakes. There was no offer of any kind at Crowne Plaza which was disappointing. I felt like I was inconveniencing the staff which left me feeling embarrassed & awkward.
Location: Crowne Plaza Dubai - Festival City, an IHG hotel
